Comments:
An ancient skeleton has been discovered in Jerusalem in a rich man&#039;s tomb. 
Colouration of the wrist and leg bones indicates the cause of death was 
crucifiction. other signs, include a gold coin bearing the marks of Pontius 
Pilate and faint markings around the skull, lead authorities to suspect that 
these could be the bones of Christ. Politicians, clerics, religious extremists 
and those using terror as a means to an end, find their beliefs and identities 
test while risking their lives to unearth the truth
